option.dialogDescription: Please DO NOT share your seed phrase with anyone, including websites, online services and other wallets. Doing so may result in permanent and irreversible loss of your funds. Continue only if you know what you are doing.

saveRecoveryPhrase.save: Please write your recovery phrase down on paper and keep it in a safe, offline place. Never enter it in any online website or service
saveRecoveryPhrase.alert: If you lose your recovery phrase, your wallets cannot be recovered
saveRecoveryPhrase.confirm: I have safely stored my recovery phrase offline

restoreRecoveryPhrase.showPassword: To restore your wallet, please provide the same BIP39 password you used when created the protected recovery phrase.

confirmRecoveryPhrase.checkRecoveryPhrase: Please make sure that your recovery phrase matches the following:
confirmRecoveryPhrase.alert: It is recommended not to skip verification, so that any misspellings could be deteted

setPassword.setPassword: Set a password to protect your wallet in everyday use.

contactForm.BroadcastedDoiTx: Broadcasted DOI permission transaction to Doichain node...
contactForm.usedEmailError: this email already exist, please use another one

deleteContact.confirm: Do you really want to delete this contact? this process cannot be undone

deleteWallet.confirm: Do you really want to delete this wallet? this process cannot be undone

sendAmount.broadcastedDoicoinTx: Broadcasted Doicoin tx to Doichain node
